column2: While running through the halls of the castle, you find an open door and decide to investigate. As you enter you see one of the courtiers in a state of nature.
You hear a screech from the hall. Racing towards it, you find [From.GetFirstName] and a courtier in the nude. Fascination plain on [From.GetHerHis] face.
You hear a screech from the hall. Racing towards it, you find [From.GetFirstName] and a courtier in the nude. [From.GetHerHis] face is averted and [From.GetSheHe] is clearly uncomfortable.
You enter the kitchen to find a magnificent layout of foods, as you look over it your mouth begins to water at the thought of it.
You find [From.GetFirstName] in the kitchen, [From.GetHerHis] face covered in fat and cream.
You find [From.GetFirstName] in the kitchen, [From.GetHerHis] eyes fixed on the food platters.
While walking through the castle halls, you find a ring on the ground and slip it on your finger. After court later one of the courtiers approaches you about it.
Oh yes, I found it. Here.
You happen upon [From.GetFirstName] in an argument with a courtier, the latter is raging about a stolen ring.
You happen upon [From.GetFirstName] who is giving a ring to one of the courtiers.
Hurry up, we need to begin today's lesson.
Take it back, keep what's yours.
The dawn's light just barely cracking in the east sees you awake much earlier than usual.
Morning's business sees you knock at [From.GetFirstName]'s door then enter. You find [From.GetHerHim] asleep in bed.
Morning's business sees you knock at [From.GetFirsName]'s door, then enter. There you find [From.GetHerHim] at the table, today's books open.
You can go back to bed.
While in court one day, [Liege.GetFirstName] announces that one of  the courtiers will be receiving a prestigious new title.
You find [From.GetFirstName] is complaining loudly and often about not having an honorific.
After a recent court meeting, [From.GetFirstName] is speaking carefreely with a recently honored opposition courtier.
You need to move past it.
